title: Two-in-one excellence
text:
One disruption caused by Hurricane Michael was to the timeline for announcing a District Teacher of the Year.

So, 2019, saw the crowning of two District Teachers of the Year and they just happen to be on the same faculty at Port St. Joe Jr./Sr. High School.

Lindsay Summerlin was named the District Teacher of the Year for 2019 in January and in December, back on the proper timeline, Jae Glass was announced as the 2020 District Teacher of the Year.
